Oportun, Inc. | Sr. Monitoring Engineer | San Carlos, CA or REMOTE with travel| VISA transfer OK| https://careers.oportun.com

To apply: sean.ivich@oportun.com

We're looking for a Sr. Monitoring Engineer that will drive the planning, design, implementation and operation of monitoring, logging, and alerting for our tech infrastructure and apps, in a hybrid cloud environment.

Looking for the following experience: Monitoring solutions like New Relic, Sentry, Pager Duty, Splunk, or Nagios. Logging solutions experience such as SumoLogic, Elasticsearch, Logstash, etc. Working knowledge of Config Management (Ansible, Chef, or Puppet) and public cloud environment experience.

For more information, please visit:

https://careers-oportun.icims.com/jobs/6646/sr.-monitoring-e...
